Comment: I agree with you in principle. One problem posed by their flood-the-zone strategy is that people become divided over what deserves a response and what should be ignored. We need to get more skilled at speaking quickly and decisively on matters like this without allowing specific incidents to drown out larger themes. We don‚Äôt have to get angry about a hypothetical Trump Pope, but we can absolutely highlight his behavior. If he‚Äôs trolling, he‚Äôs an unserious person acting irresponsibly in dire times. If he‚Äôs serious, he‚Äôs either delusional or has nefarious plans.   Not everything needs to be a crusade, and we don‚Äôt need to spend equal time on all fronts, but there‚Äôs nothing wrong with articulating how unfit he is at every opportunity.
